name: Hop Fish: Spinning
description:
Spin fishing is an angling technique where a spinning lure is used to entice the fish to bite. Spin fishing is used in both freshwater and marine environments. Spin fishing is distinguished between fly fishing and bait cast fishing by the type of rod and reel used. There are two types of reels used when spin fishing, the open faced reel and the closed faced reel. 

Catch as many fish as possible to become a real fisherman. SHARE your catches with your friends, so as not to be considered a lying fisherman...
